p: A375 (human melanoma cell line) and MCF7 (human breast cancer cell line) were obtained from National Cell Bank of Iran (Pasteur Institute, Tehran, Iran). Cell lines were maintained in RPMI 1640 medium supplemented with 10 % (v/v) fetal bovine serum (FBS) (Gibco, Invitrogen, Paisely, UK), penicillin (100 units/ml) and streptomycin (100 mg/ml). Cells were incubated at 37 Â°C under 5% CO 2/95 % air in a humidified atmosphere.
